Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ConnectionToServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ConnectionToServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventToServerNotifier, java.lang.Runnable
public class ConnectionToServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, EventToServerNotifier
This class handles the send of information from the client to the server Implements Runnable and EventToServerNotifier interface

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ConnectionToServer​(java.net.Socket socket)
    The socket created is passed to this class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void asyncSendEvent​(EventToServer event)
    Sends the event with a thread to the server of this connection.
    void closeConnection()
    Close the connection and set the server like inactive
    java.lang.String getAddress()
    Gets the ip address to the connection
    void run()

    Sends the line choose of the market choose by the player to the server.

    Sends the initial leader card that the player decides to discard to the server.

    Sends the initial deposit state choose by the player to the server.

    Sends the actions on the leader cards choose by the player to the server.

    Sends to the server the new deposit state and the discarded resources from the market that the player has managed in the market turn.
    void sendNumPlayer​(int num)
    Sends the number of player, that the client decides to set for this match, to the server.
    void sendPing()
    Sends a ping to the server.

    Sends the choice of the name by the client to the server.
    void sendReplayLorenzoAction()
    Sends to the server the replay of the lorenzo action event.

    Sends the choice of the room number choose by the client to the server.

    Sends to the server the development card that the player wants to buy.
    void sendSelectedDevelopmentCardSpace​(int space)
    Sends to the server the space in which the player decides to put the development bought.

    • sendRoom

      public void sendRoom​(int room, boolean newRoom)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends the choice of the room number choose by the client to the server.
      Specified by:
      sendRoom in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      room - The room number choose by the player.
      newRoom - Is true if the room is new, so the server has to create the room, is false id the room already exists.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      leaderCard1 - The first initial leader card that the player decides to discard.
      leaderCard2 - The second initial leader card that the player decides to discard.

    • sendLeaderCardActions

      public void sendLeaderCardActions​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> actions, boolean isFinal)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends the actions on the leader cards choose by the player to the server.
      Specified by:
      sendLeaderCardActions in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      actions - The actions on the leader cards choose by the player.
      isFinal - Is true if the event is sent at the final stage of the turn, is false if the event is sent at the initial stage of the turn.

    • sendChooseLine

      public void sendChooseLine​(int numLine, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> leaderMarketWhiteChange)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends the line choose of the market choose by the player to the server.
      Specified by:
      sendChooseLine in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      numLine - The number line of the market choose by the player.
      leaderMarketWhiteChange - Indicates if the player has active one or more leader cards market white change.

    • sendNewDepositState

      public void sendNewDepositState​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> newDepositState, int discardResources, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDepositState)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends to the server the new deposit state and the discarded resources from the market that the player has managed in the market turn.
      Specified by:
      sendNewDepositState in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      newDepositState - The new deposit state choose by the player.
      discardResources - The number of resources from the market that the player has discarded.
      isAdditional - Indicates if the player has some active additional deposit.
      additionalDepositState - The new state of the active additional deposit of the player.

    • sendSelectedDevelopmentCard

      public void sendSelectedDevelopmentCard​(int color, int level)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends to the server the development card that the player wants to buy. The development card is recognised by level and color.
      Specified by:
      sendSelectedDevelopmentCard in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the development card choose by the player.
      level - The level og the development card choose by the player.

    • sendSelectedDevelopmentCardSpace

      public void sendSelectedDevelopmentCardSpace​(int space)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends to the server the space in which the player decides to put the development bought.
      Specified by:
      sendSelectedDevelopmentCardSpace in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      space - The space in which the player decides to put the development bought.

    • sendSelectedProductionDevelopmentCard

      public void sendSelectedProductionDevelopmentCard​(boolean useBaseProduction, Resource resourceRequested1, Resource resourceRequested2, ProductedMaterials resourceGranted, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> materialLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useDevelop)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends to the server all the production that the player decided to activate.
      Specified by:
      sendSelectedProductionDevelopmentCard in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      useBaseProduction - Is true if the player wants to use the base production power, else is false
      resourceRequested1 - The first material choose by the player to use for the base production power.
      resourceRequested2 - The second material choose by the player to use for the base production power.
      resourceGranted - The resource that the player wants to generate from the base production power.
      useLeaders - The position of the leader card is true if the player wants to use a leader card additional production, else false. All the leader card that are not additional production are set on false in this ArrayList.
      materialLeaders - The material chooses by the player to use for the additional production power of the leader cards.
      useDevelop - The development card that the player decides to activate.

    • sendTurnPlayed

      public void sendTurnPlayed​(java.lang.String turnType)
      Description copied from interface: EventToServerNotifier
      Sends to the server the type of the turn that the player choose. This method is used only for the debug and test. If the player on the CLI types 'turn' the player skip the turn.
      Specified by:
      sendTurnPlayed in interface EventToServerNotifier
      Parameters:
      turnType - The type of turn choose by the player.
